content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good to meet you, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. Based on your requirements and the current market conditions, I am willing to offer a rental price of €1,200 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1200 Euro. Thank you for your understanding. Can I move in on the 1st of next month?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Yes, you can move in on the 1st of next month. I will prepare the necessary documentation and send it to you as soon as possible.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to pay my first month's rent in advance. Is that possible?

I would also like to know if there are any additional fees that I need to pay.

Lastly, can I ask if you have any references that I can contact, to ensure that the apartment is in good condition and the landlord is reliable?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Yes, it is possible to pay your first month's rent in advance. In fact, I would encourage you to do so, as it will show your commitment to the rental agreement and help us to finalize the arrangement more quickly.

As for any additional fees, I will discuss them with you during the negotiation process. However, I can assure you that there will be no hidden costs or unexpected charges.

Regarding references, I have a number of satisfied tenants who can provide you with feedback on my property and my management style. I will be happy to provide you with their contact information upon request.
name: Heinrich Heine
